se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.event.api.publisher

Interface EventPublisher<E,T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventConsumerWrapper<T>

    public interface EventPublisher<E,T>
extends EventConsumerWrapper<T>
    Specification for an object publishing event objects (of any arbitrary class) to a bus-like structure similar to in-process MessageProducers. The specification for in-process MessageConsumers, as well as the registration process between EventPublisher and -Consumer is left to concrete implementations.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void publish(E event)
      Publishes an event (object) for consumption by registered consumers.

      • Methods inherited from interface se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.event.api.EventConsumerWrapper

        addConsumer, getConsumer, getConsumerIDs, removeConsumer

    • Method Detail

      • publish

        void publish(E event)
        Publishes an event (object) for consumption by registered consumers.
        Parameters:
        event - The event to publish. Should not be null.
